Localisation.value: Jika kamu meninggalkan tantangan sekarang, maka permainan akan berakhir.

Localisation.key: Your score has been rejected by our fraud check system. MPL takes cases of fraud in games seriously. If you think that we made a mistake, please contact our customer support.
Localisation.value: Skor Anda telah ditolak oleh sistem pelacak kecurangan. MPL menindaklanjuti perihal kecurangan dengan sangat serius. Jika ada kesalahan, silakan menghubungi Customer Service kami.

Localisation.key: You have been playing on MPL for more than  {0}h and {1}m.How would you like to proceed?
Localisation.value: Kamu telah bermain di MPL selama lebih dari {0} jam {1} mnt. Jadi gimana, Pro?

Localisation.key: Scores of All Players are verified
You got disconnected as MPL app was minimized. Please do not minimize app during a game.
Localisation.value: Permainan kamu terputus karena memperkecil layar Aplikasi MPL. Mohon tidak memperkecil layar saat permainan berlangsung.

Localisation.key: You can start a new battle and not wait for all players to finish. Results of this battle can be seen in Game History.

Localisation.key: You can start a new battle without waiting.Results can be seen in game history.

Localisation.key: Are you sure you want to leave now?

Localisation.value: Silakan kembali ke rosolusi semula untuk melanjutkan permainan

Localisation.key: Do not minimize or switch to a different app while waiting for your opponent or during gameplay.
Localisation.value: Jangan perkecil layar atau buka aplikasi lain saat menunggu lawan atau di tengah permainan.
